Actions.Name: Heavy Mace
Actions.Effects: Foe is weakened. Deals fray damage to all adjacent characters to the foe.
Actions.Exceed: Deals bonus damage and foe is stunned.

Actions.Name: Rocket Jump
Actions.Description: The [name] rushes 3 spaces in a straight line, ignoring terrain and movement penalties. All adjacent foes when it finishes this movement are shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Shield Jumper
Actions.Description: An adjacent ally to the [name] uses its shield as a springboard and can fly 3.

Actions.Name: Arkentech Repulser Shield
Actions.Description: The [name] becomes immobile and gains aura 2 until the end of its next turn. The [name] and any of its allies inside the aura have resistance against abilities originating from characters inside the aura. Foes entering the aura must first pass a save, or become unable to enter the area by any means on a failed save until the start of their next turn.
